short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks every word you translate from english to spanish and vice versa (in WordReference web)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you to improve your vocabulary, as will keep track of the words you translate from English to Spanish or vice versa.
In the UI you can see the top 10 words by frequency and also you are able to download a json file with the whole summary.
